bibdata.title: IEEE General Requirements and Test Code for Oil Immersed HVDC Converter Transformers
IEEE General Requirements and Test Code for Oil Immersed HVDC Converter Transformers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by IEEE Std C57.129-2007. The electrical, mechanical, and physical requirements of oil-immersed single-phase and three-phase converter transformers are specified in this standard. Tests are described and test code defined. Devices such as arc furnace transformers and rectifier transformers for industrial or locomotive applications are not covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.129-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.129-1999)
IEEE Std C57.129-2007 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.129-1999)
